name: part_011
file: tmp_【＃不知火フレア生誕祭 】3D Singing Live！誕生日だし一緒に盛り上がろう！ 【ホロライブ⧸不知火フレア】 [_rJhAn6ZPuU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare performs her original song 'Smile & Go!!' during her 3D Birthday Live. The performance includes high-energy singing, dancing, and an MC segment where she hypes up the audience before the final chorus.
A static end card for the 3D Birthday Live featuring an illustration of Shiranui Flare with celebratory birthday text.

subtitles.original: 乗り遅れないように手繋ごう (もうちょっとだけ一緒にいよう)
subtitles.english: Let's hold hands so we don't get left behind (Let's stay together just a little longer)

subtitles.original: 気づけば隣にいてくれてありがとう どんな高い壁だって
subtitles.english: Thank you for being by my side, no matter how high the wall is

subtitles.original: (ハイハイ！)
subtitles.english: (Go, go!)

subtitles.original: ひとっ飛びで飛び越えて
subtitles.english: We'll leap over it in a single bound

subtitles.original: (ハイハイ！)
subtitles.english: (Go, go!)

subtitles.original: 誰も見たことない世界に みんなで行こうよ！
subtitles.english: Let's all go to a world that no one has ever seen!

subtitles.original: 君とSmile & Go!! 楽しんだもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile & Go!! The one who has the most fun wins

subtitles.original: 君とSmile & Go!! ハジけたもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile & Go!! The one who goes all out wins

subtitles.original: ここに笑顔で集まれば 最高でしょ (yeah!)
subtitles.english: It's the best when we gather here with smiles (yeah!)

subtitles.original: 僕らSmile & Go!! いつも全力で
subtitles.english: We'll Smile & Go!! Always with all our might

subtitles.original: 僕らSmile & Go!! 遊びまくろう
subtitles.english: We'll Smile & Go!! Let's play to our heart's content

subtitles.original: だって (そうさ) この日常が大切な宝物だよ
subtitles.english: Because (that's right) this everyday life is a precious treasure

subtitles.original: Smile & Go!!
subtitles.english: Smile & Go!!

subtitles.original: 雑談配信 今日はまったり行きましょう
subtitles.english: A chatting stream, let's take it easy today

subtitles.original: たわいない話 聞いて欲しくて (聞いて聞いて ちょっと聞いてよ～)
subtitles.english: I want you to listen to my silly talk (Listen, listen, just listen to me~)

subtitles.original: たまにはお休みしようと思ったけれど
subtitles.english: I thought about taking a break once in a while

subtitles.original: やっぱり晩酌配信しちゃおうかな (用意が出来たら 乾杯！)
subtitles.english: But I guess I'll do a drinking stream after all (Cheers once you're ready!)

subtitles.original: ありふれたこの時も 一緒に過ごしたら
subtitles.english: If we spend even these ordinary times together

subtitles.original: いつの間にかキラキラと
subtitles.english: Before long, it'll sparkle

subtitles.original: (ハイハイ！)
subtitles.english: (Go, go!)

subtitles.original: 何よりも輝いて
subtitles.english: And shine brighter than anything

subtitles.original: (ハイハイ！)
subtitles.english: (Go, go!)

subtitles.original: 言葉には出来ない想いが 溢れ出しちゃうよ
subtitles.english: Feelings that can't be put into words are overflowing

subtitles.original: 君とLet's Enjoy!! 歌ってみようよ
subtitles.english: With you, Let's Enjoy!! Let's try singing

subtitles.original: 君とLet's Enjoy!! 心を一つに
subtitles.english: With you, Let's Enjoy!! Let's become one in heart

subtitles.original: どこにいたって優しさは 届いてるよ (yeah!)
subtitles.english: No matter where you are, your kindness reaches me (yeah!)

subtitles.original: 僕らLet's Enjoy!! テンション上げでさ
subtitles.english: We'll Let's Enjoy!! Raising our energy

subtitles.original: 僕らLet's Enjoy!! はしゃぎまくろう
subtitles.english: We'll Let's Enjoy!! Let's frolic to our heart's content

subtitles.original: きっと (そうさ) 明日はもっと楽しいこと待っているから
subtitles.english: Surely (that's right) even more fun things await us tomorrow

subtitles.original: Ladies and Gentlemen!
subtitles.english: Ladies and Gentlemen!

subtitles.original: よそ見してたら置いてっちゃうから 最後まで盛り上がってきなー！
subtitles.english: If you look away, I'll leave you behind, so stay hyped until the end!

subtitles.original: 耳の奥かっぽじってよく聴いて！
subtitles.english: Clean out your ears and listen closely!

subtitles.original: もっともっと楽しんで！ガチ恋していけー！ラストー！
subtitles.english: Have more and more fun! Show me your serious love! Last part!

subtitles.original: いくよー！せーの！3, 2, 1, GO!
subtitles.english: Here we go! Ready! 3, 2, 1, GO!

subtitles.original: ずっと見ていて 私のことを これから先も期待してね？
subtitles.english: Keep watching me, and look forward to what's to come, okay?

subtitles.original: 予測不能なワクワクを 君に送るから
subtitles.english: I'll send you unpredictable excitement

subtitles.original: 君とSmile & Go!! 楽しんだもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile & Go!! The one who has the most fun wins

subtitles.original: 君とSmile & Go!! ハジけたもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile & Go!! The one who goes all out wins

subtitles.original: ここに笑顔で集まれば 最高でしょ (yeah!)
subtitles.english: It's the best when we gather here with smiles (yeah!)

subtitles.original: 僕らSmile & Go!! いつも全力で
subtitles.english: We'll Smile & Go!! Always with all our might

subtitles.original: 僕らSmile & Go!! 遊びまくろう
subtitles.english: We'll Smile & Go!! Let's play to our heart's content

subtitles.original: だって (そうさ) この日常が大切な宝物だよ
subtitles.english: Because (that's right) this everyday life is a precious treasure

subtitles.original: とびきりの笑顔でいこう Smile & Go!!
subtitles.english: Let's go with our best smiles, Smile & Go!!

subtitles.original: 今日はみんな、生誕祭ライブ、聴いてくれてどうもありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you all so much for listening to my birthday live today!

subtitles.original: 生誕祭 3Dライブ
subtitles.english: Birthday Anniversary 3D Live
